pullrequest.title: Added brackets and fixed spacing, no functional changes

content.raw:
That is correct. The intent is that ABI/API compatible bug fixes should got to gazebo_2.0.

For example, this pull request doesn't really fix a bug but it's ABI/API compatible.
If I created an issue saying "Style is broken in GpuRaySensor.cc", then someone should correct me and say something like "This doesn't fix a bug, please target to gazebo_2.1"
content.html:
That is correct. The intent is that ABI/API compatible bug fixes should got to gazebo_2.0.

For example, this pull request doesn't really fix a bug but it's ABI/API compatible. If I created an issue saying "Style is broken in GpuRaySensor.cc", then someone should correct me and say something like "This doesn't fix a bug, please target to gazebo_2.1"
